thread.section_title: Time4Learning Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Time4Learning | time4learning.com
thread.title: Julie

author: Julie
title: Julie
text: I have really enjoyed watching my children grow and actually learn. I like the fact they have different options on how to get ciriculum done. I also like if they are struggling they can go back a grade. If they aren't being challenged enough they can go a grade ahead. I really enjoy the easy to read reports to check in on the children. I have really enjoyed using this ciriculum. The children seem to enjoy it too!!!
